title: Warlock
content:
ave Proficiency in these from their Race or other Class if they Multiclassed, and really should since it helps beef up their AC. Eldritch Blast gains a second beam at level 5 and third beam at level 10. This is character level though, not Warlock level, allowing you to multiclass and still have a powerful Eldritch Blast.

You can search by Name, Level, School, Casting Time and Class. Just type into the search box what you are looking for.
